text.content:
# OpenInfra Days Special Edition

**OpenInfra Days Europe is a series of community-powered OpenInfra Days and meetups throughout Europe.**

The event will take place throughout **May and June 2024 in Sweden, Germany, Turkiye and France**. In addition, other regions including the UK and Switzerland will be participating with meetups!

The CFPs for these events will be going live in Q1 of 2024. In the meantime take a look at how your organization can [support these events by being a sponsor](https://openinfrafoundation.formstack.com/forms/2024_openinfra_events_updates).

#### OpenInfra Day Sweden
May 7, 2024
[Volvohallen](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Gunnar+Engellaus+v%C3%A4g+2,+418+78+G%C3%B6teborg,+Sweden/@57.7242383,11.8490387,17z/data=!4m16!1m9!3m8!1s0x464f8c78c6219f2b:0x1a73507f9863eb79!2sGunnar+Engellaus+v%C3%A4g+2,+418+78+G%C3%B6teborg,+Sweden!3b1!8m2!3d57.7242775!4d11.8483159!10e5!16s%2Fg%2F11cnd7r_rq!3m5!1s0x464f8c78c6219f2b:0x1a73507f9863eb79!8m2!3d57.7242775!4d11.8483159!16s%2Fg%2F11cnd7r_rq?entry=ttu), Gothenburg, Sweden
[Register Now](https://oidsweden2024.openinfra.dev/)

#### OpenInfra Day Germany x Sovereign Cloud Stack Summit
May 14 & 15, 2024
[Villa Elisabeth](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Villa+Elisabeth/@52.5331269,13.3972411,15z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x47a851f492be67f9:0x70038e11de799c16!8m2!3d52.5331269!4d13.3972411!16s%2Fg%2F11jfcbz7dv?entry=ttu), Berlin, Germany

#### OpenInfra Day Turkiye
May 20, 2024
[Albert Long Hall Cultural Center](https://maps.app.goo.gl/rPTB4oZabiJtfYdE9), Boğaziçi University, Istanbul, Turkiye
[Register Now](https://openinfraturkiye.org.tr/event-registration/) | [CFP](https://openinfraturkiye.org.tr/call-for-presentations)

#### OpenInfra Day France
May 2024
More info coming soon

#### OpenInfra Meetups: The UK
May 2024
More info coming soon

#### OpenInfra Meetup: Switzerland
June 6, 2024
[CERN](https://www.google.com/maps/place/CERN/@46.2337442,6.056322,15.89z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x478c62fcec737b11:0x81bef3ae7a885e31!8m2!3d46.2330492!4d6.0556771!16zL20vMDk5cm4?entry=ttu), Geneva, Switzerland
[Register Now](https://indico.cern.ch/e/openinfra-cern-2024)
